name: Save game
author: Avaro
info: This script saves the game, and it can play a sound effect before doing so too.Available as FFC script or as Item script.
description: This script saves the game, and it can play a sound effect before doing so too.The FFC script version could be useful after certain cutscenes, perhaps. There is also a version of the FFC script that will only save once.The item version is basically an usable "save-button" as an item. xD
setup: D0 in the FFC/Item settings is the sound effect you want to play when saving the game. Leave it at 0 if you don't want one.In the "Only Save Once" version, D1 is the Screen->D register to use. If you are unsure, leave it at 0.
